name: A Blind Man´s Walk Through A Dragons Cave
name_original: A Blind Man´s Walk Through A Dragons Cave
description:
This a short story about a blind man and a dragon cave. In the game you got some chooses, and for each of them is there a right and a wrong answer.

The game is played with the mouse, and SOUND IS IMPORTANT IN THIS GAME.

Good luck and have fun

This game is made for adults and it is therefor not recommended kids to play this game.
